trans-unit.source: Dispute Resolution
trans-unit.target: 爭端解決

trans-unit.source: This document is a recommended dispute resolution process for community members to help resolve disputes with other PowerShell Gallery publishers.
trans-unit.target: 本文件為建議社群成員使用的爭端解決程序，以協助解決與其他 PowerShell 資源庫發行者的爭端。

trans-unit.source: Process
trans-unit.target: 處理程序

trans-unit.source: Contact the owners of the item you have the dispute with using the **Contact Owners** link on the item details page.
trans-unit.target: 使用項目詳細資料頁面上的 [連絡擁有者] 連結，連絡有爭端的項目擁有者。

trans-unit.source: Explain your issue in a kind and direct manner.
trans-unit.target: 以和善、適當的口吻說明您的問題。

trans-unit.source: Send a copy of your message to [cgadmin@microsoft.com](mailto:cgadmin@microsoft.com) so that PowerShell Gallery Administrators are aware of your dispute.
trans-unit.target: 將您的訊息副本傳送到 [cgadmin@microsoft.com](mailto:cgadmin@microsoft.com)，讓 PowerShell 資源庫系統管理員了解到您的爭端。

trans-unit.source: Wait a maximum of 30 days and if you don’t have resolution notify [cgadmin@microsoft.com](mailto:cgadmin@microsoft.com) again.
trans-unit.target: 如果等候 30 天後仍沒有解決方法，請再次通知 [cgadmin@microsoft.com](mailto:cgadmin@microsoft.com)。

trans-unit.source: The PowerShellGallery.com support team will get involved and try to work this out.
trans-unit.target: PowerShellGallery.com 支援小組會參與其中，並嘗試解決此問題。

trans-unit.source: Prohibited Use
trans-unit.target: 禁止用途

trans-unit.source: The following things are not allowed on the public PowerShell Gallery and will be immediately removed without discussion.
trans-unit.target: 公用 PowerShell 資源庫不允許下列事項，並會在未經討論的情況下立即移除。

trans-unit.source: Item owners will be notified if their item is removed.
trans-unit.target: 項目擁有者會在項目遭移除時收到通知。

trans-unit.source: Malware, adware, or any kind of spyware
trans-unit.target: 惡意軟體、廣告軟體或任何種類的間諜軟體

trans-unit.source: Items that are designed to harm the user systems;
trans-unit.target: 旨在傷害使用者系統的項目；

trans-unit.source: Copyright infringement or license violation;
trans-unit.target: 侵害著作權或違反使用權；

trans-unit.source: Illegal content;
trans-unit.target: 內容不合法；

trans-unit.source: "Squatting" on item names that you plan to use but are not actually using.
trans-unit.target: 「佔用」您打算使用但未實際使用的項目名稱。

trans-unit.source: This also includes publishing items that have zero productive content.
trans-unit.target: 這也包括發行生產內容為零的項目。

trans-unit.source: Either publish code and get going or concede the name to someone who actually has a product to ship; and
trans-unit.target: 請發行程式碼並開始執行，或將名稱讓給其他實際上有產品要出貨的人；以及

trans-unit.source: Attempting to make the gallery do something that it is not explicitly designed to do.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試讓資源庫執行未明確設計要執行的事項。

trans-unit.source: If you find a item that is in violation of any of these items, click the ‘Report Abuse’ link on the item details page and submit a report.
trans-unit.target: 如果您發現有項目違反其中任一項目，請按一下項目詳細資料頁面上的 [檢舉不當使用] 連結並提交報告。

trans-unit.source: This policy is subject to change at the discretion of the PowerShell Gallery.
trans-unit.target: 本原則可能隨 PowerShell 資源庫而變更。
